MENU.ID, MENU.PARENT_ID, MENU.PARENT_IDS, MENU.NAME, MENU.SORT, MENU.HREF, MENU.TARGET, MENU.ICON, MENU.IS_SHOW, MENU.PERMISSION, MENU.CREATE_BY, MENU.CREATE_DATE, MENU.UPDATE_BY, MENU.UPDATE_DATE, MENU.REMARKS, MENU.DEL_FLAG
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM admin_user A JOIN sys_user_role B ON A.ID=B.USER_ID JOIN sys_role C ON B.ROLE_ID=C.ID JOIN sys_role_menu D ON C.ID=D.ROLE_ID JOIN sys_menu MENU ON D.MENU_ID=MENU.ID WHERE A.ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_menu
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_IDS = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HREF = #{href,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=CHAR},

UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
